example.code:
PS C:\>Get-IAMVirtualMFADevice -AssignmentStatus Assigned
Base32StringSeed : EnableDate : 4/13/2015 12:03:42 PM QRCodePNG : SerialNumber : arn:aws:iam::123456789012:mfa/David User : Amazon.IdentityManagement.Model.User
Base32StringSeed : EnableDate : 4/13/2015 12:06:41 PM QRCodePNG : SerialNumber : arn:aws:iam::123456789012:mfa/root-account-mfa-device User : Amazon.IdentityManagement.Model.User
example.description: This example retrieves a collection of the virtual MFA devices that are assigned to users in the AWS account. The User property of each is an object with details of the IAM user to which the device is assigned.
